EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-06-27-HyperFlex-AppD.June_Webinar-2018-06-20-HyperFlex-AppD Email 2.MQL
EmailTemplate.subject: [LIVE Webinar] Panelist Discussion Cisco + Turbonomic on App-Aware, Full-Stack Optimization
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-hyperflex-appdynamics/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
What happens when you combine AppDynamics, Hyperflex, and Turbonomic? Learn how you can achieve application-aware, full-stack optimization on hyper-converged, multi-cloud greatness for your organization at our live webinar on Wednesday, June 27th at 11am ET. <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-hyperflex-appdynamics/]]>
Our technical panelists from Cisco and Turbonomic will cover topics like:
- Application-Awareness - Cloud Elasticity On-Prem - Super Cluster Optimization - Cloud Migration & Dynamic Optimization
We hope to see you there!
Regards, Team Turbonomic
PS - If you can't join the live webinar, feel free to sign up anyway <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/webinar-cisco-hyperflex-appdynamics/]]>, and we'll email you the recording afterward.
